fields.Title: VILLAGE / SHACK DOOR
fields.Description: The shack door dialogue, if you have gained access to the shack where you can sleep. It's locked until you get it from the Washerwoman.

fields.Title: Shack Door: "It's getting cold this late in the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's getting cold this late in the night. Time to call it a day.
fields.Alternate1: It's getting late and it's raining. Time to call it a day.
fields.Alternate2: It's getting late and it's snowing. Time to call it a day.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll wait outside to give you some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll wait outside to give you some time and privacy to check out your new living arrangement. But just so you know..."
fields.Alternate1: "I'll wait outside to give you some time and privacy to check out your new living arrangement and look for any signs of Ruby. But just so you know..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""After we're done with the day, I'l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "After we're done with the day, I'll still be staying in the Whirling-in-Rags for the night. We'll meet in front of the shack in the morning."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll be sleeping in my room in the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll be sleeping in my room in the Whirling. We'll meet in front of the shack in the morning."
fields.Alternate1: "It's getting late. I'll let you sweep this place on your own. I'm sure you can handle the washerwoman... I'll be sleeping in my room in the Whirling. We'll meet in front of the shack in the morning."

fields.Title: You: ""Good night, Kim." (Send him away f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good night, Kim." (Send him away for the night.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good night, officer. We'll meet in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good night, officer. We'll meet in front of the shack in the morning."

fields.Title: You: "Unlock the shack door with the key."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unlock the shack door with the key.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm afraid we don't have time for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid we don't have time for rest stops right now, officer. We should really get back to the Whirling."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good night." He smiles: "And try n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good night." He smiles: "And try not to break the case without me."

fields.Title: You: ""I'll sleep here then. See you in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll sleep here then. See you in the morning." (Keep turning the key.)

fields.Title: Shack Door: "The key turns with a satisfying cli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The key turns with a satisfying click. You can enter the shack now.

fields.Title: Shack Door: "The door has seen better days -- th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The door has seen better days -- the layer of paint has started to peel off due to the salt and wind from the sea. Even the lock looks slightly rusted.
